about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Malpani Pipes and Fittings Limited is engaged in manufacturing high-grade plastic pipes.

The company offers High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) Pipes, Medium-Density Polyethylene (MDPE) Pipes, and Linear Low-Density Polyethylene (LLDPE) Pipes, all marketed under its brand name "Volstar". Additionally, the company is involved in trading granules and PVC pipes, along with selling various services.

The company’s pipes are designed for irrigation, water supply, sewerage, drainage, boreholes, tube wells, and infrastructure projects like electrical cable and optical fiber installations.

The company’s manufacturing plant, located in Ratlam, Madhya Pradesh, is equipped with essential machinery and an in-house testing facility. It operates 10 production lines with a capacity of 11,500 M.T.P.A.
The company distributes products to wholesalers, and retailers, and supplies pipes for government projects through authorized contractors, as well as to farmers under welfare policies.

Products:

  • HDPE Pipes: High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) pipes, available in 20mm to 2000mm sizes, are used for water supply, irrigation, and industrial piping due to strength, durability, and chemical resistance.
  • MDPE Pipes: MDPE pipes are durable, flexible, and corrosion-resistant, used in water supply, gas distribution, irrigation, mining, and construction projects for reliable performance.
  • Lateral Pipes (LLDPE): Lateral pipes, made from premium HDPE, are durable, flexible, and corrosion-resistant, ideal for irrigation, water supply, and drainage systems.
  • Drip Irrigation Pipes: Drip irrigation pipes efficiently deliver water to plants, conserving water and promoting healthy growth in agriculture, horticulture, and commercial applications.

As of December 31, 2024, the company had 51 full-time employees and 30 contract-based employees.

Competitive Strength:

  • Wide Geographical Reach
  • Strategically located manufacturing facilities with a core focus on quality
  • Diversified product mix
  • Experienced Promoter and strong management team
  • Quality

faqs.question: What is the Malpani Pipes IPO?
faqs.answer:
Malpani Pipes IPO is a SME IPO of 2880000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 29, 2025, and closes on January 31, 2025.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Malpani Pipes IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Malpani Pipes IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Malpani Pipes IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Malpani Pipes IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Malpani Pipes IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Malpani Pipes IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Malpani Pipes IPO opens on January 29, 2025 and closes on January 31, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Malpani Pipes IPO?
faqs.answer: Malpani Pipes IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Malpani Pipes IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Malpani Pipes IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Malpani Pipes IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Malpani Pipes IPO will be done on Monday, February 3, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, February 3, 2025. Check the Malpani Pipes IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Malpani Pipes IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Malpani Pipes IPO listing date is on Tuesday, February 4, 2025.
